thread.title: Ice Capades: Volvo V90 Cross Country Driven in Sweden’s Frozen North
thread.title_full: Ice Capades: Volvo V90 Cross Country Driven in Sweden’s Frozen North

author: Joe Lorio
title: Ice Capades: Volvo V90 Cross Country Driven in Sweden’s Frozen North
text:
-A veneer of wood-look siding once was de rigueur for the well-dressed wagon, but today it seems the only way to sell a station wagon in America is to adorn it with the trappings of an SUV. So it should come as no surprise that Volvo has created a Cross Country version of its new V90 wagon —it follows in the tire treads of recent similar offerings such as the V60 Cross Country, Subaru’s Outback , Audi’s A4 Allroad , and the Volkswagen Golf Alltrack . READ MORE ›› 
-
